title: In-Depth Secondary Function Education Program Utilizing Dynamic Geometry Software in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of linear functions and basic algebraic operations
context.additional_context: Interactive learning utilizing GSP (Geometer's Sketchpad) software in VR-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the graph forms of quadratic functions (upward/downward convexity, axis, vertex) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can use GSP software to analyze in real-time simulations how coefficient changes in quadratic functions affect their graphs.
Learners can model real-life problems (e.g., parabolic motion, bridge design) as quadratic functions and derive equations for optimization.

resources: Quadratic Function Worksheet and Assessment Template

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
